title.rendered: Meet Sweeten NY General Contractors Andreas and Lambros

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This Sweeten contractor duo continues to put the client’s needs first

At Sweeten, the experts in our network are experienced contractors and design pros we’d be thrilled to have working in our own homes. We check their licenses, insurance, quality of work, and customer service skills. Trust and open communication are the lifeblood of our free renovation service, and our personal connection to our experts enables us to match you to the best choices for your project. Here, get to know their personality and click to view their portfolio, including photos from past work and client reviews, so that you can hire the right team and renovate with confidence.

Check out Andreas and Lambros portfolio

Where are you from and how long have you been in construction?

Andreas: I was born in Brooklyn, grew up in Cyprus, and came back to New York for college, in my early 20s. I’ve been in the construction business professionally for 10 years.

Lambros: I am from the island of Cyprus and moved to the States 30 years ago. I have been involved in the construction industry for 28 years.

How did you get into this industry?

Andreas: I obtained my Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees in Civil Engineering and worked for several design firms in New York City. Later on, I decided to follow my passion and open my own construction company.

Lambros: My passion started even before coming to the USA. While I was attending college, I looked for a job related to the field of architectural design. I started by working for a contractor and then decided to open a construction company.

What do you love most about what you do?

Andreas: I enjoy every step of the process. I love helping people transform their place.

Lambros: I love the experience with the clients and the satisfaction that comes with a finished project.

What is the biggest challenge about renovating in New York City?

Andreas: Dealing with the unexpected issues that come with the old New York City’s buildings.

Lambros: Renovating historic buildings in New York City. Understanding how the building was built is a challenge, but there is an immense pleasure in discovering, bit by bit, how it came to be in its present form.

What do you want all of your clients to know before you work with them?

Andreas: We always put an emphasis on our client’s needs and desires for their home. We want our clients to trust the process and we promise that we will deliver more than expected. We always put our clients first.

Lambros: We want all of our clients to feel confident that the job will be done to their highest expectations.

What is your favorite city/town neighborhood?

Andreas: Astoria, Queens.

Lambros: Boston, MA.

What is your favorite New York City restaurant?

Andreas: Limani at Rockefeller Center.

Lambros: Aureole, New York City.

Check out Sweeten general contractors Andreas and Lambros’s portfolio of work.

Andreas and Lambros have been Sweeten general contractors since May 2021

—

Sweeten handpicks the best general contractors to match each project’s location, budget, scope, and style. Follow the blog for renovation ideas and inspiration and when you’re ready to renovate, start your renovation on Sweeten.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
